con:part.con:content: <definitions name="Email_1" targetNamespace="http://email.svc.itasia.juliusbaer.com/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://email.svc.itasia.juliusbaer.com/"> <xsd:include schemaLocation="schema/Email_1.xsd"/> <xsd:import namespace="http://bjbservice.svc.itint.juliusbaer.com/" schemaLocation="schema/BJBHeader_2.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="sendEmailRequest"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:emailRequestINTO_1"/> <part name="BJBHeader" element="hd:ServiceHeader"/> </message> <message name="sendEmailResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:emailResponseTO_1"/> </message> <message name="EmailServiceException"> <part name="fault" element="tns:EmailServiceException"/> </message> <message name="EmailServiceBizException"> <part name="fault" element="tns:EmailServiceBizException"/> </message> <portType name="Email_1PortType"> <operation name="sendEmail"> <input message="tns:sendEmailRequest"/> <output message="tns:sendEmailResponse"/> <fault name="EmailServiceException" message="tns:EmailServiceException"/> <fault name="EmailServiceBizException" message="tns:EmailServiceBizException"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="Email_1Binding" type="tns:Email_1PortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="sendEmail"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal" parts="parameters"/> <soap:header use="literal" part="BJBHeader" message="tns:sendEmailRequest"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> <fault name="EmailServiceException"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="EmailServiceException"/> </fault> <fault name="EmailServiceBizException"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="EmailServiceBizException"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="Email_1"> <port name="Email_1Port" binding="tns:Email_1Binding"> <soap:address location="https://iilint.sin.juliusbaer.com:8181/Email_1/Email_1"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://bjbservice.svc.itint.juliusbaer.com/" jaxb:extensionBindingPrefixes="xjc" elementFormDefault="qualified" jaxb:version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:hd="http://bjbservice.svc.itint.juliusbaer.com/" xmlns:jaxb="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb" xmlns:xjc="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jaxb/xjc"> <xs:annotation> <xs:appinfo> <jaxb:schemaBindings> <jaxb:package name="com.juliusbaer.itint.svc.bjbservice"/> </jaxb:schemaBindings> <jaxb:globalBindings> <xjc:serializable uid="1"/> </jaxb:globalBindings> </xs:appinfo> </xs:annotation> <xs:element name="ServiceHeader" type="hd:serviceHeaderType"/> <xs:complexType name="serviceHeaderType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceName" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="serviceVersion" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="userId" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="locationCode" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="txnId" type="hd:txnIdType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="applId" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="environmentId" type="hd:environmentIdType" nillable="false" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="channelId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="userCredential" type="hd:userCredentialType" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="languageCode" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="entityId" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="serviceAccessCredential" type="hd:serviceAccessCredential" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="userACLs" type="hd:aclDetail" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="userRoles" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="serviceAccessCredential"> <xs:attribute name="secureAppUuId" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="serviceToken" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="txnIdType"> <xs:attribute name="applId" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="txnSeqNumber" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="environmentIdType"> <xs:attribute name="environmentType" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="environmentName" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="userCredentialType"> <xs:attribute name="userCredentialType" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="userToken" type="xs:string" use="optional"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="aclDetail"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="userId" type="xs:string" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="aclEntity" type="hd:aclEntity" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <!--Possible values for entityRelation are "Owner", "Co-Owner", "Beneficial-Owner" etc--> <xs:element name="entityRelation" type="xs:string" nillable="true" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="accessRights" type="hd:accessRights" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="aclEntity"> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:string" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="type" type="hd:aclEntityType" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="aclEntityType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="AccountNo"/> <xs:enumeration value="ClientId"/> <xs:enumeration value="ProspectId"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="accessRights"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="readRights" type="xs:boolean" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="editRights" type="xs:boolean" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="deleteRights" type="xs:boolean" nillable="false" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://email.svc.itasia.juliusbaer.com/" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://email.svc.itasia.juliusbaer.com/" xmlns:bs="basetypes.itint.juliusbaer.com"> <xs:import namespace="basetypes.itint.juliusbaer.com" schemaLocation="baseTypes_2.xsd"/> <xs:element name="EmailServiceException" type="tns:emailFaultInfo"/> <xs:element name="EmailServiceBizException" type="tns:emailFaultInfo"/> <xs:element name="emailRequestINTO_1" type="tns:emailRequestINTO_1"/> <xs:element name="emailResponseTO_1" type="tns:emailResponseTO_1"/> <xs:complexType name="emailRequestINTO_1"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="to" type="bs:emailId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="cc" type="bs:emailId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="bcc" type="bs:emailId" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="from" type="bs:emailId" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="subject" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="body" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="contentType" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="emailResponseTO_1"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="emailFaultInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<!--Published by JAX-WS RI at http://jax-ws.dev.java.net. RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.1.8-hudson-39-.--> <xs:schema targetNamespace="basetypes.itint.juliusbaer.com" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:base="basetypes.itint.juliusbaer.com"> <xs:complexType name="account"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="clNo" type="base:clNo"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="rubric" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ccyCode" type="base:ccyCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="portfolio"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="accNo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="1"/> <xs:element name="rub" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ccyCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3}"/> </xs:restriction> <!--Defines the ISO currency codes--> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="clNo"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="8"/> </xs:restriction> <!--Defines the account number for BJB--> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="amountValue"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:totalDigits value="17"/> <xs:fractionDigits value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="amountRange"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="fromAmount" type="base:amount"/> <xs:element name="toAmount" type="base:amount"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="sign"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="+"/> <xs:enumeration value="-"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="amount"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="value" type="base:amountValue"/> <xs:element name="sign" type="base:sign"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="periodicity"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Hourly"/> <xs:enumeration value="Daily"/> <xs:enumeration value="Weekly"/> <xs:enumeration value="Bi-Weekly"/> <xs:enumeration value="Monthly"/> <xs:enumeration value="Quaterly"/> <xs:enumeration value="Half Yearly"/> <xs:enumeration value="Annually"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="rate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="value" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="sign" type="base:sign"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="ctyCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="commonforexRate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> <xs:fractionDigits value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="commonBasisAmount"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> <xs:fractionDigits value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="languageCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2}"/> </xs:restriction> <!--Defines the ISO currency codes--> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="dateRange"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="fromDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="toDate" type="xs:date"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="emailId"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Za-z0-9_]+([-+.'][A-Za-z0-9_]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9_]+([-.][A-Za-z0-9_]+)*\.[A-Za-z0-9_]+([-.][A-Za-z0-9_]+)*"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
